message: Let's start fair.  Take $1000, and I'll keep the rest. We can always adjust in the next round if you're unhappy.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Time is money, and we both lose if we drag this out.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I also need to get a decent amount. We both have a lot to lose if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
Alice, I appreciate you moving towards a more balanced split.  I'm proposing we flip your last offer.  This seems fair considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
We're getting closer. Let's split it evenly this time. We both get a significant share, and we don't need to worry about losing more money to inflation.
